nodes.bodyText: Not sure the the should be there. Maybe some native speaker can comment.

You need an a, as the issue is you're using a single-node cluster.
Maybe this is clearer: Cruise Control cannot be deployed with a single-node Kafka cluster. It requires at least two Kafka nodes.
sorry to be picky, I would invert the conditions in the if. Logically you should check the number of replicas only if CC is deployed otherwise it's useless :-)
